nomi-san/parsec-vdd

virtual display driver for adding extra screens to Windows for streaming or remote work

View on index

Related repos

  • Cross-platform SDR software with waterfall display and multi-VFO support
  • Turn screens into windows into virtual worlds
  • turns your Mac displays into scalable, customizable screens with extra brightness and virtual display features
  • Screencast creator for Windows and Linux
  • video upscaling and restoration for ComfyUI using SeedVR2, supports multi-GPU
  • Hardware-accelerated screenshot annotation tool
  • Bridges HDMI CEC to USB HID keyboard control
  • Self-hostable video player with authentication
  • GUI for yt-dlp with 4K support and channel subscriptions
